title: Multi-timeframe trading analysis for WEEX spot market with GPT-4o & Telegram
description:
# üìä WEEX Spot Market Quant AI Agent (All-in-One Multi-Agent Trading System)

## ‚ö° Overview

This **multi-agent n8n workflow** delivers an **automated, intelligent trading analysis system** for the **WEEX Spot Market**. It uses **GPT-4o** to interpret user prompts, route them to the correct sub-agent tools, analyze technical indicators, price data, sentiment insights, and return concise trading signals via **Telegram** or downstream automations.

No need to download additional workflows‚Äî**everything is embedded in this single orchestrated agent.**

---

## üß† Core Features

üîπ **Single-entry architecture** ‚Üí Built-in orchestration logic with **no external subworkflow dependencies**
üîπ **Multi-timeframe indicator analysis** ‚Üí 15m, 1h, 4h, and 1d
üîπ **Sentiment + news insights** from crypto sources
üîπ **Live price, volume, kline, and order book analysis**
üîπ **LLM-powered signal evaluation** using **GPT-4o**
üîπ **Telegram integration** for fast human queries or autonomous alerts

---

## ü§ñ Built-In Agent Modules

| Module                              | Description                                                |
| ----------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚úÖ **Financial Analyst Tool**        | Routes prompts, interprets tokens, and triggers sub-agents |
| ‚úÖ **News & Sentiment Analyst Tool** | Gathers real-time sentiment from crypto news sources       |
| ‚úÖ **Technical Indicator Tools**     | 15m, 1h, 4h, 1d indicators using WEEX spot market data     |
| ‚úÖ **Price & Order Book Agent**      | Fetches real-time stats, price, and structure              |
| ‚úÖ **Trading Signal Evaluator**      | GPT-4o merges all data and generates trading decision      |

---

## üñ•Ô∏è Prompt Flow Example

```
User Input: ‚ÄúShould I long or short ETH on WEEX today?‚Äù
‚Üí Financial Analyst Agent interprets the query
‚Üí Fetches multi-timeframe indicators, live price, sentiment
‚Üí GPT-4o evaluates conditions and creates recommendation
‚Üí Output delivered via Telegram:
```

üìà ETH/USDT Overview
‚Ä¢ Price: \$3,710
‚Ä¢ 4h RSI: 64.5 ‚Äì Slightly Overbought
‚Ä¢ MACD: Bullish Crossover
‚Ä¢ Market Sentiment: üîº Positive
**Recommendation**: Consider long entry with stop at \$3,640.

---

## üîß Setup Instructions

Follow these steps to fully deploy and operate the WEEX Quant AI Agent in your n8n environment:

1. **üü¢ Get Telegram Bot API Key**

   * Create your bot via **[@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather)** on Telegram
   * Save the token it gives you (format: `123456789:ABCdefGHIjkLMNopQRStuvWXyz`)

2. **üîë Add OpenAI / DeepSeek Chat API Key**

   * Compatible with **GPT-4o** (OpenAI) or **DeepSeek Chat**
   
3. **üìà (Optional) WEEX API Keys**

   * If expanding to live trading or authenticated data, get a **WEEX Spot API key** from your account dashboard
   * Not required for the analysis agent to function

4. **üîó Connect Telegram to n8n**

   * Use `Telegram Trigger` and `Telegram` node with your API key
   * Ensure webhook is set correctly (or use polling mode)


---

## ‚úÖ Example Use Cases

| Scenario                           | Outcome                                               |
| ---------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚ÄúIs BTC bullish or bearish?‚Äù       | Merged indicator + sentiment + price analysis summary |
| ‚ÄúGet 15m and 4h trends for SOL‚Äù    | Multi-timeframe volatility vs macro trend report      |
| ‚ÄúLatest crypto news on XRP‚Äù        | Real-time filtered news + DeepSeek sentiment summary  |
| ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the order book structure?‚Äù | Level-by-level spread analysis with buy/sell volumes  |

---

## üé• Watch the Live Demo

[![Watch the Live Demo](https://img.youtube.com/vi/cc6wMdxwwLw/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/cc6wMdxwwLw)



---

## üë®‚Äçüíº Licensing & Support

üßæ **¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company**
Architecture, prompts, and trade signal framework are IP-protected. No unauthorized rebranding or replication permitted.

üì© **Connect with the Creator**
**Don Jayamaha** ‚Äì [LinkedIn Profile](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
